line.comment: * Clone array of ships to be upgraded
* Log start upgrade run, memory upgrade credits before upgrade run
* = Preparations
* Supply Command Software required to run this script
* If carrier has no free docking bays right in the beginning, thus no ships can be served, break operation
* Clear array from any ships not able to dock at carrier, dock those ships to a safe station, if they are sitting dead in space
* Log if there are any undockable ships
* Break operation, if the carrier has no free docking bays
* Undock carrier, if necessary
* Lets pickup any ships not docked at the carrier
* Check, if any ships could not be docked at the carrier on account docking bay shortage, resize consumer array to only those docked at carrier
* Log how many ships remain for actual upgrade run
* = Install engine tunings, rudder and cargo bay extensions
* Supply Command Software required to run this script

line.text: '%sPreparations ended, following ships are in overflow'
'%sBeginning instaling engine tunings, rudder and cargo bay extensions'

line.comment: * = Install ship upgrades
* Supply Command Software required to run this script

line.text: '%sTunings installation ended, following ships are in overflow:'

line.comment: * Log how many ships remain for actual upgrade run
* = Dock consumers once done
* Supply Command Software required to run this script

line.text: '%sEquipping of tech upgrades ended, following ships are in overflow:'
'%sThere are still ships to be served, so dock ships upgraded to some station and care about the rest.'

line.comment: * Order all ships to dock here
* Order all ships to dock at their respective homebase
* Order all ships to dock at safe station
* Log end of upgrade run, which ships are to be docked at a safe station and how many ships remain for actual upgrade run

sval.val: Auto prep ships: main script
no docking ports
%sOverflow: %s
%sPreparations ended, following ships are in overflow
%sFollowing ships are currently processed:
%sBeginning instaling engine tunings, rudder and cargo bay extensions
%sTunings installation ended, following ships are in overflow:
%sFollowing ships are currently processed:
%sBeginnning upgrade installation.
%sEquipping of tech upgrades ended, following ships are in overflow:
%sFollowing ships are currently processed:
%sThere are still ships to be served, so dock ships upgraded to some station and care about the rest.
%sDocking set to %s
%sDocking set to homebase
%sDocking set to station
%sRemaining consumers:%s
Clone array of ships to be upgraded
Log start upgrade run, memory upgrade credits before upgrade run
= Preparations
Supply Command Software required to run this script
If carrier has no free docking bays right in the beginning, thus no ships can be served, break operation
Clear array from any ships not able to dock at carrier, dock those ships to a safe station, if they are sitting dead in space
Log if there are any undockable ships
Break operation, if the carrier has no free docking bays
Undock carrier, if necessary
Lets pickup any ships not docked at the carrier
Check, if any ships could not be docked at the carrier on account docking bay shortage, resize consumer array to only those docked at carrier
Log how many ships remain for actual upgrade run
= Install engine tunings, rudder and cargo bay extensions
Supply Command Software required to run this script
= Install ship upgrades
Supply Command Software required to run this script
Log how many ships remain for actual upgrade run
= Dock consumers once done
Supply Command Software required to run this script
Order all ships to dock here
Order all ships to dock at their respective homebase
Order all ships to dock at safe station
Log end of upgrade run, which ships are to be docked at a safe station and how many ships remain for actual upgrade run
